participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is thoughtful and enjoys sharing her love for books and travel. She is warm-hearted and always eager to help others.
participant_1.background: i am 60years old. i think i'll retire in a few years. i'm a librarian. i've visited spain a times. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is playful and imaginative, often lost in her own world of games. She is a bit shy but has a vivid imagination.
participant_2.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i don't have many friends. i hate school. i love to play pobox.

content.text: Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?
